类 ContactsListView.GroupAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.smssdk.gui.ContactsListView.GroupAdapter

    public abstract static class ContactsListView.GroupAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    自定义组的abstract类，用于填充listview的item
